title: Stuck on logging on
body: Yesterday, i could not connect to the game after champion selection. So i had to turn off the launch and restart my computer. But when i tried to log in again, it's just stuck on the log in status screen. I have done everything to fix it based on those old discussion boards on the internet but nothing seems fixed. Please help me if you have any ideas.

replies.body: Your network seems to be having problems reaching the authentication servers, so it can't get past the login as well as the game servers.  Did you recently perform a windows or software update that might be blocking connection?  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and make sure your settings are allowing access.
Im having same problem as her and already tried everything, but appearantly the only server im getting this problem with is NA server, I can connect to all other servers just fine.
